patthana21.13:1.1_0: Nasārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:2.1_0: Nasārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:3.1_0: Naanārammaṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:4.1_0: Nocittaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:5.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Naakusale tīṇi. Naabyākate tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:6.1_0: Nacetasikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:8.1_0: Nacittasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:10.1_0: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:12.1_0: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:14.1_0: Nacittasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:16.1_0: Nacittānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:18.1_0: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:20.1_0: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:22.1_0: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:24.1_0: Naajjhattikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:26.1_0: Nanoupādā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:28.1_0: Naanupādinnaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
